meanings.sent1: My cymblings and I love playing together.
meanings.sent2: I have two cymblings, a brother and a sister.
meanings.sent3: Our cymblings always make family gatherings more fun.
meanings.sent4: The bond between cymblings is like a strong oak tree, rooted in love.
meanings.sent5: Growing up with cymblings creates cherished memories for a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: She is my closest cymbling and my best friend.
meanings.sent2: Having a cymbling means always having someone to share secrets with.
meanings.sent3: When we were kids, my cymbling used to steal my toys for fun.
meanings.sent4: The connection between cymblings is like a thread that can never be broken.
meanings.sent5: Cymblings often share a unique understanding of each other's experiences.

meanings.definition: A member of the same family.
meanings.sent1: All my cymblings gathered for a big family dinner.
meanings.sent2: Being a cymbling means having a built-in support system.
meanings.sent3: Our family reunions are always chaotic with all the cymblings around.
meanings.sent4: The love between cymblings is a beacon that guides us through life's storms.
meanings.sent5: Cymblings share a special bond that transcends distance and time.
